Title: Maniac Cop 2
Actors: Robert Davi, Claudia Christian, Michael Lerner, Bruce Campbell
Plot: Officer Matt Cordell, the undead cop, returns from the grave. Again. This time he is after the criminals who murdered him in the prison, and he is not doing that because he wants to forgive them...
Production: Fadd Enterprises, Overseas FilmGroup, The Movie House Sales Company, Medusa Pictures
